Room.Name: Leviathan Drive/Yellow Marsh Road Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Yellow Marsh Road and Leviathan Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Yellow Marsh Road is a short road which runs west from Leviathan, forming the southern edge of the Avatar Ruins. Leviathan Drive continues to the north and south. On the east side of the road is a strange, mysterious forest where trees seem to grow very tall, but no one dares to venture in.
